words.meaning: /bɑːɡən/ v,n. to discuss prices, with somebody in order to reach an agreement that is acceptable
words.vietnamese: (v) trả giá, mặc cả, (n) món hời, cơ hội tốt (buôn bán)

words.meaning: /beə/ v. to be able to accept and deal with something unpleasant
/bi'heivjə/ n. the way that somebody behaves, especially towards other people
words.vietnamese: thái độ, hành vi, cách cư xử, cách đối xử, cách ăn ở

words.meaning: /’tSekaùt/ n. the place where you pay for the things that you are buying in a supermarket
/'kʌmfət/ v,n. the state of being physically relaxed or having a pleant life
words.vietnamese: (v) làm khuây khỏa; (n) sự thoải mái,thoải mái, dễ dàng

words.meaning: /iks'pænd/ v. to become greater in size, number or importance
words.vietnamese: mở rộng, trải rộng, giãn ra, nở ra; khai triển, phát triển

words.meaning: /iks'plɔ:/ v. to examine something completely or carefully to find out more about it
words.vietnamese: khảo sát, thăm dò, khám phá

words.meaning: /'aitem/ n. one thing on a list of things to buy, do, talk about, etc

words.vietnamese: thuộc lệnh, bắt buộc, ủy nhiệm, ủy thác

words.meaning: /'mə:tʃəndaiz/ n. goods that are bought or sold; goods that are for sale in a shop / store
/ˈstrɪktli/ adv. with a lot of control and rules that must be obeyed
words.vietnamese: một cách nghiêm ngặt, nghiêm khắc; chính xác, đúng, hoàn toàn

words.meaning: /trend/ n. a general diretion in which a situation is changing or developing
words.vietnamese: khuynh hướng, xu hướng, phương hướng, mốt đang thịnh hành
